meanings.definition: Send (a letter or package) by airmail.
meanings.sent1: She airmailed the birthday card to her grandma.
meanings.sent2: He always airmails important documents to ensure they arrive quickly.
meanings.sent3: The cat airmailed a love letter to the dog next door.
meanings.sent4: His words were airmailed across the room, reaching her heart instantly.
meanings.sent5: The idea was airmailed to everyone in the company, sparking excitement.

meanings.sent1: The airmailed package arrived in just a few days.
meanings.sent2: She received an airmailed letter from her pen pal in another country.
meanings.sent3: The airmailed invitation fluttered down from the sky, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: His airmailed postcard brought a piece of the world to her doorstep.
meanings.sent5: The airmailed gift was wrapped in excitement and anticipation.
